about_the_game:
Play as a member of the Order of the Vortex, a Star Knight tasked with defending the human kingdoms from the terrors that lie within the Vortex. This rogue-lite, shoot-em-up with bullet-hell game play will test your skill as well as your decision making abilities. Choose your ship, build your crew, buy upgrades, and unlock items to create the ultimate build.



The Vortex: The Vortex, a massive rift in space and time, created by an ancient, forgotten power. Filled to the brim with horrifying creatures, the Vortex is an incredibly hostile environment in which only the strongest can survive. Battle waves of enemies as you fight to get closer to your goal, the dark heart of the Vortex. Collect Void Crystals every time you conquer to change up the game.

The Order: The Order of the Vortex is a knightly order sworn to defend humanity from the horrors of the Vortex. Unlock new ships, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. Choose from an assortment of unlockable crew members to drastically change the way you play. Add attachments to your ship and upgrade them with credits you collect in each level. Beat challenge levels and find unique items to compliment your abilities. Create the ultimate build and destroy your enemies.

demo Features:

  • 3 unlockable ships, each with their own strengths and weaknesses
  • 7 unlockable crew members with unique abilities to change up your run
  • 15 upgradable attachments to keep yourself alive and destroy your enemies
  • 13 items gained through completing challenges
  • 3 Void Crystals to progress through, adding an extra layer of challenge

fullgame.name: Star Knight: Order of the Vortex

name: Star Knight: Order of the Vortex Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-9880H CPU @ 2.30GHz 2.30 GHz
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Star Knight: Order of the Vortex is a rogue-lite, shoot-em-up made to give you fun and interesting decisions and test you skill in action-packed, bullet-hell gameplay. Choose your crew, upgrade your ship, and explore the unknown depths of the Vortex.
